channel.title: Command on player not working plz help

item.title: Command on player not working plz help
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

ok i just made this command for mods on my server wich allowes them to freeze and unfreeze players but for some reason it keeps saying player dousnt exsist ect… every time we try and do it.
please help thankyou here the code for both commands…

if (command.startsWith("freeze")&& playerRights >= 1) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.sendFrame126("unlucky", 149); p.entangle(); p.EntangleDelay = 99999999; p.inwildy = false; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // p.sendMessage("You've been frozen by "+p.playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to make a chicken."); } } if (command.startsWith("unfreeze")&& playerRights >= 1) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.sendFrame126("unlucky", 149); p.entangle(); p.EntangleDelay = 0; p.inwildy = false; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // p.sendMessage("You've been frozen by "+p.playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to make a chicken."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Command on player not working plz help
